results.content: Not what i expected.  I figured i would have more into the forms.  I don't feel that it was worth the money.
results.content_html: Not what i expected. I figured i would have more into the forms. I don't feel that it was worth the money.

results.content:
Good quality course. The author discusses a lot of different elements which are important to build forms, shows a lot of websites to find content and explains the concepts clear. 
What I did miss was which text editor was used in the beginning and some excerise to practice. Therefore, it is a bit theoretical, but for a complete beginner such as myself - an excellent introduction to building HTML5 forms.
results.content_html:

results.content: The information in this course was very clearly explained and lessons crafted at a speed that was easy to follow _ My reason for giving 4.5 and not 5 Stars is the title of the course is 'Everything You Need To Know' _ The course content is now a little dated but much of what is taught is still valuable _ However_ in that the course was last updated January 2017 it would have been good to include a lecture on form validation using Google's ReCaptcha _ It would be great to see this in any future update _ Thanks

results.content: As usual from oreilly media. Though falls a tad short of Dave Hollingworth effort on "become an expert at creating forms in html". That is super.
